amendment.description: Amendment to direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to the Congress a report on methods to increase electric grid resilience with respect to all threats, including cyber attacks, vandalism, terrorism, and severe weather, no later than 120 days after the date of enactment of the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-359 to direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to the Congress a report on methods to increase electric grid resilience with respect to all threats, including cyber attacks, vandalism, terrorism, and severe weather, no later than 120 days after the date of enactment of the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Jackson Lee amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
